articles.title: 'Biggest mistake Indian cricket has made in last two World Cups...': Gambhir - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Gautam Gambhir said India need to build a core and make sure they play every match before the ODI World Cup. Calling workload management 'the biggest mistake in Indian cricket' in the last couple of years or so, the former left-handed batter said taking break…
articles.content: This year marks a decade of India's ICC trophy drought. Since the 2013 Champions Trophy victory under MS Dhoni, Team India has come close in the 2014 T20 World Cup, 2017 Champions Trophy, and in the … [+4226 chars]
